name: Balancing Act (Berez)
description:
Important: unfortunately the web build keeps crashing, and the audio is broken on some devices, so please download the game!

Balancing Act

Collab - music by Danioc, art/code/SFX by Berez for Trijam #133 - theme: "don't drop it". Additional SFX by NenadSimic.

A game where you fling boomerang at zombies whilst simultaneously carrying gold on your head - can you do both at once?

Times (spread out over two days), not including planning, building and creating the itch page:

Berez - Art - 30m, Code - 2hr15m, menus and SFX - 45m (I slightly ran out of time so I overan by 30m, but this isn't really part of the core game)

Danioc - Music - 1hr30m

Instructions

Kill zombies by aiming your boomerang with LMB and releasing to fire. Move around with mouse, and pick up gold dropped by zombies. You carry the gold in your hat. Avoid zombies who hurt you and knock you back. Don't move too fast or turn quickly though as you will drop all your gold. See how much gold you can hold at once.
